sentences.en: Are you brave enough to impeach or disclose the units or individuals that contaminate environment?
sentences.cn: 你有勇气检举、揭发污染环境的单位和个人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Blagojevich says the decision to impeach was not a surprise.
sentences.cn: 布拉戈耶维奇称弹劾他的决定早已料到.

sentences.en: Dare to impeach the traitorous minister and advocate of anti - gold, against the peace negotiation.
sentences.cn: 敢于弹劾奸臣,主张 抗 金, 反对议和.

sentences.en: If the House votes to impeach, managers are selected to present the case to the Senate.
sentences.cn: 如果众议院通过弹劾成案, 则选出[承办人员]将弹劾案送交参议院.

sentences.en: Impeach of manager of his decision whereaboutldirection attendants this.
sentences.cn: 他决定去向经理检举这个侍者.

sentences.en: Richard M. Nixon: They can't impeach me for bombing Cambodia.
sentences.cn: 尼克松: 他们不能控告我对柬埔寨的轰炸.

sentences.en: She will be in a state of mind to impeach the justice of the Republic.
sentences.cn: 她正处在咒骂共和法律的一种心里状态之中.

sentences.en: The angry congressman wanted to impeach the President.
sentences.cn: 这位愤怒的国会议员想要弹劾总统.

sentences.en: The committeedecided to impeach the President.
The governor was impeached for using state funds improperly.
sentences.cn: 州长因违规使用州政府资金而受到弹劾。

sentences.en: The police should open sheet to report on the spot him, he pollutes impeach environment.
sentences.cn: 警察当场要开单告发他, 检举他污染环境.

sentences.en: We must impeach the judge for taking bribes.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要检举法官收受贿赂.

trans.tran_cn: [律]控告, 检举, <主美>弹劾, 怀疑
trans.tran_en: if a government official is impeached, they are formally charged with a serious crime in a special government court

trans.tran_cn: 控告（某人）犯罪，弹劾，对（某事物）怀疑，提出异议
